setup.cfg¶

 1[metadata]
 2name = mastermind
 3version = attr: mastermind.__version__
 4description = Jeu du Mastermind
 5long_description = file: README.rst
 6long_description_content_type = text/x-rst
 7author = Constance GANOT and Olivia VIDAL VELAZQUEZ
 8author_email = constance.ganot@etu.univ-lyon1.fr and olivia.vidal-velazquez@etu.univ-lyon1.fr
 9license = LGPL v3.0
10license_files = LICENSE
11url = https://gitlab.in2p3.fr/constance.ganot/mastermind
12keywords = game , mastermind
13classifiers =
14    Development Status :: 2 - Pre-Alpha
15    Intended Audience :: Science/Gamers
16    License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 (LGPLv3)
17    Programming Language :: Python :: 3
18    Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Game
19
20[options]
21zip_safe = False
22include_package_data = True
23packages = find:
24python_requires = >=3.6
25install_requires =
26    rich
27
28[options.package_data]
29* = config/*
30
31[options.extras_require]
32docs = nbsphinx; ipython
33mcmc = emcee; corner
34plot = mpld3
35tests = pytest; coverage
36
37[build_sphinx]
38source-dir = docs/
39build-dir = docs/_build
40all_files = 1
41
42[options.entry_points]
43console_scripts =
44    # le script myscript correspond à la fonction main()
45    # du fichier mastermind/__main__.py
46    myscript = mastermind.__main__:main
